articles.title: Politics to weigh more heavily on ag markets: CBA
articles.summary: Geopolitics, trade policy and government intervention are set to play a defining role in agricultural markets in the year ahead, according to CBA's 2026 Agri Commodities Outlook.

articles.title: Cargill submits plans for 1.1Mt WA crush plant
articles.summary: Public consultation has opened on Cargill’s Project Crux, which plans to crush 1.1Mt of WA canola per annum next to CBH’s Kwinana Grain Terminal.

articles.title: People on the Move in the grain industry
articles.summary: Who is on the move in the Australian grain industry? Catch up with our latest update on industry appointments, rewards and achievements…..

articles.title: Feedgrain Focus: Prices rally on dry, slow grower selling
articles.summary: Supplementary livestock feeding and a lack of grower selling has put some heat into eastern Australian feedgrain markets this week.

articles.title: South Coast systems help WA handle record harvest
articles.summary: Two vast WA cropping operations have cleared the high-moisture hurdle by developing their own grain-handling systems that supercharge their ability to outturn to CBH.

articles.title: Daily Market Wire 22 January 2026
articles.summary: Corn and beans strength supported wheat which slipped later in the session. WA softens, eastern wheat steadies.

articles.title: Cropping gains 933,000ha at pastures’ expense: DAS
articles.summary: Mixed-farming, high-rainfall, and irrigation areas have accounted for much of the 900,000ha shift from pastures to cropping seen by DAS in the past two years.

articles.title: WA panel approves Perth oat mill despite initial objections
articles.summary: Swan Milling P&E's plans to build an oat mill in Perth are inching forward to support the interests of a diverse group of shareholders.

articles.title: Uncontained WA fire reaches into farmland
articles.summary: Two fires west of Esperance have burnt more than 80,000ha of mostly bushland, although some farmland has been affected, and one farm dwelling has been lost.

articles.title: Aus exports 912,990t barley, 29,910t sorghum in Nov
articles.summary: Australia exported 912,990t of barley and 29,910t of sorghum in Nov, according to the latest ABS data.

articles.title: Saga Robotics bets big on US vineyards with new GM, fresh capital for UV-C ‘bots: ‘Chemical free winegrowing is the holy grail’
articles.summary:
During the 2025 California wine grape season, Saga Robotics increased treated acreage tenfold and expects to nearly triple it again in 2026.

The post Saga Robotics bets big on US vineyards with new GM, fresh capital for UV-C ‘bots: ‘Chemical free winegrowing is the holy grail’ appeared first on

articles.summary:
‘The ability to spray at night is probably the single largest value proposition,’ says Pyka CEO Michael Norcia.

articles.summary:

articles.title: AgBot prepares onion land with spader–power harrow combination
articles.summary: ‘If it were not so cold, I would sit and watch it all day. It is going brilliantly.’ Dutch Arable farmer Marijn Vermuë is enthusiastic about how effortlessly the AgBot from AgXeed, fitted with a spading machine and power harrow, prepares the sugar beet land for onions for the 2026 season. At the end of […]

articles.title: Strawberry picking robot Dogtooth ready for practical use
articles.summary: The English company Dogtooth presented its picking robot for harvesting strawberries during Strawberry Day on 7 January. The model presented is designed for harvesting on pipe rail systems. From 2027 onwards, models on wheels and tracks will follow. The version shown during the Dutch Strawberry Day was positioned on a pipe rail system with an […]

articles.title: These 8 laser weeders are already up for sale: an overview and buying tips
articles.summary: 2 years ago, you could only turn to 1 supplier for a laser weeder. Today, there are at least 8. Most suppliers can deliver next year, while the others are keen to hear if Dutch growers are interested. Future Farming explored the market, gathered tips and lists the systems in a clear overview.
